message: Starting Phase 3 verification review - gathering handover document and agent findings

Found critical bug in state_db.py: get_agents_for_task doesn't parse tracked_files JSON. Preparing verdict.
Review completed. Verdict: REJECTED. Found critical bug in state_db.get_agents_for_task() - tracked_files JSON not parsed, causing dashboard agents API to crash. Phases API works correctly.
